BRIEF-Sensata Technologies To Sell Valves Business To Pacific Industrial Co May 21 (Reuters) - Sensata Technologies Holding Plc: * PRESS RELEASE - SENSATA TECHNOLOGIES ENTERS INTO AGREEMENT TO SELL VALVES BUSINESS TO PACIFIC INDUSTRIAL CO. * SENSATA IS MAINTAINING ITS FULL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EPS GUIDANCE OF $3.57 TO $3.73 * CO EXPECTS TO OFFSET ANY DIVESTED PROFITS THROUGH COMBINATION OF SHARE REPURCHASES AND STRONGER OPERATIONAL PERFORMANCE * SENSATA TECHNOLOGIES- SENSATAâ€™S TIRE PRESSURE MONITORING BUSINESS AND GLOBAL TPMS AFTERMARKET BUSINESS NOT PART OF TRANSACTION; WILL REMAIN WITH SENSATA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Sensata Technologies Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.85 April 24 (Reuters) - Sensata Technologies Holding PLC : * SENSATA TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE $886.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $864 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.84 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.94, REVENUE VIEW $897.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.66, REVENUE VIEW $3.51 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SENSATA - CHANGES IN FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES INCREASED ADJUSTED EPS BY $0.03 IN Q1 COMPARED TO PRIOR YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
